panels.content:
## Issues

Issues as reported on github at https://github.com/juju-solutions/bundle-canonical-kubernetes/issues

## Bundle Deployemnts

The amount of Kubernetes bundles deployed reported by the charmstore. We show the number of deployments in the period of the last one and three months as well as the total number of deployments.  (As reported by the Store on https://api.jujucharms.com/charmstore/v5/<charm-or-bundle>/meta/stats)

## Latest vs all revisions

By plotting the number of deployments of the latest revision and all revisions you can see the adoption the latest release of the charms has. These metrics are reported by the charmstore.  (As reported by the Store on https://api.jujucharms.com/charmstore/v5/<charm-or-bundle>/meta/stats)

## Charm deployments

Number of deployments for each Kubernetes charm in the last week as reported by the charmstore.

## Active Deployments

This metric, gathered from the charmstore logs, shown how many deployments were active yesterday.

## Total number of deployments

Here we show the number of deployments of the kubernetes-master charm throughout different time windows. The metrics are gathered from the charmstore logs.

panels.title: Deployments last month - life span > 2 weeks (stacked)
Deployments last 3 months - life span > 2 weeks (stacked)
Deployments last six months - life span > 2 weeks (stacked)

panels.content:
## Long lasting deployments

Same as above only this time we plot the deployments that are up and running for a period longer than two weeks. The metrics are gathered from the charmstore logs.
